attributes.action: Take ACTION and close schools to reduce the spread between children.
attributes.additional_details:
To STOP spreading the virus in schools.

Gov't asking people having cough and fever to isolate now at 'Delay' stage is too late I believe, the spread has already began (from 2 to 590 cases in just a week span) and it's going to be worst. 
As the Gov't mentioned, 80% of UK population is going to effect then what are we waiting for?? Just to make ourselves more vulnerable and be in that 80%?
attributes.background:
It's so sad to hear from 12th March 2020 news saying, "many more families are going to lose loved ones before their time". 
I wonder how Gov't could say so simply to loose a life - SAD.
